name: CineStar
description:
A creatively designed three-lane third-person runner that carries iconography and themes of Stoke-On-Trent. Your goal is to reach the cinema room before your film starts. Using W,A,S,D or Arrows Keys to dodge film and media obstacles whilst collecting tickets to increase your game time.

Do you have what it takes?

This game was a product of the Stoke On Trend 2021 Game Jam that took place over a week. The final product is a product of four foundation students studying various game-related disciplines. Our theme was Cineworld in Hanley. However, we changed the name of Cineworld to CineStar.

All assets have been made by Students @ Staffordshire University (apart from the character model).

Members:

  • Tasha Taylor - Programming, UI, and Level Design
  • Andrew Quartley - Programming and Animation Implementation 
  • Ellis Rogers-Byrne - Modeling, Texturing, Sound Design, and Video Editing
  • Jordan Thorpe - Modeling, Texturing, and Level Design
